name: cudl-schema-internal-json
description: Schemas for CUDL's internal data in JSON format

scripts.generate-manifest: find examples tests schemas -name '*.json' -or -name '*.json5' | jq --raw-input '{files: [inputs]}' > manifest.json
scripts.ensure-running-in-build-dir: if [ "$(basename "$(pwd)")" != "build" ] ; then echo 'Error: npm needs to run on package.json copied into build for this to work - see Makefile'; exit 1; fi
scripts.prepack: npm run ensure-running-in-build-dir && npm run generate-manifest
